attributes.action: Ban commercial vehicles from parking in residential streets.
attributes.additional_details: Post office vans, DPD and other delivery company vans, taxis and various other commercial vehicles are increasingly being parked outside residential property not owned by either the owner or operator of these vehicles.
attributes.background: It is becoming increasingly difficult to park in residential streets due to the number of commercial vehicles such as vans and trucks being driven home by users of these vehicles.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Parking is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
